title: Tezpur University Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Guest Faculty Post
description: The Tezpur University has announced a notification for the recruitment of Guest Faculty Vacancy. Eligible Candidates who are interested can apply for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025 . Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E./B. Tech, M.E/M. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application...
